title: Bluey: Daddy Robot: A Father's Day Book
description: Can Bluey and Bingo get Daddy Robot to tidy up the playroom?A book for kids of all ages.Bluey is an award-winning preschool show about Bluey, a blue heeler pup, and her family. Airing on ABC KIDS, the show has amassed legions of dedicated fans and hugely popular ranges of books, toys, clothes, games and more.
author: Bluey
